meanings.definition: The branch of science that deals with the measurement and representation of the Earth's surface.
meanings.sent1: Geodetics involves precise measurements of the Earth's surface.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use geodetics to map out different regions of the planet.
meanings.sent3: The geodetics experts made sure to measure every inch of the land accurately.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of geodetics was as clear as a perfectly drawn map.
meanings.sent5: Learning about geodetics is like unraveling the secrets of the Earth's surface.

meanings.definition: The study of the shape and dimensions of the Earth.
meanings.sent1: Studying geodetics helps us understand the Earth's shape better.
meanings.sent2: Geodetics provides insights into the size of our planet.
meanings.sent3: The geodetics class had fun exploring the Earth's dimensions.
meanings.sent4: His mind expanded like the vastness of geodetics when he learned about Earth's shape.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of geodetics lies in uncovering the Earth's true form.
